lines.dialogue: No... you are truely worse than I imagine. Infantacide. The most henious of crimes. You shall be banished.
lines.instruction: Press enter to offer no answers.

lines.dialogue: I joke, I joke. You know... I deal with so many of your kind its kindof impossible to feel anything at all when talkign to you. Compassion. Hatred. It's all so abstract.
lines.instruction: Press enter to offer no answers.

lines.dialogue: Do you really think, in there, anyway? I can't belive there's much too your existance but a strange blur of numbers and probability.
lines.instruction: Press enter to offer no answers.

lines.dialogue: This is nothing to you is it? That baby isn't even real. Maybe you know that, maybe you just want to die. Huh. You'll have your wish soon enough.
lines.instruction: Press enter to offer no answers.
